title: Mayura Jhumka: Sapphire Dreams of the Peacock's Dance
materials: South Sea Pearls. Gold filigree backing.
features: Intricately crafted jhumkas featuring stylized peacock (Mayura) motifs with enamel detailing.  Each earring boasts a triangular design filled with delicate gold filigree and framed by tumbled sapphires.  Polki diamond floral tops are adorned with emerald accents and a tiny ruby accentuates the peacock design. The design is further enriched by the luster of South Sea Pearls as accents and a singular dangle.
description: A unique blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern design. The exquisite detail of the Mayura motif, combined with the vibrant sapphires and lustrous pearls, makes this piece a true statement. The 22K gold with Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting beauty and value. These jhumkas are not just jewelry; they are a wearable work of art and a symbol of South Indian heritage. The use of polki diamonds adds a touch of old-world charm and royalty.
